title: Is CA a competitive exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello No, CA does not fall under the category of competitive exams . It is an exam for professional diploma certificate that enables you with a title in front of your name. The title is an internationally recognized professional designation; the certified public accountant designation is generally equivalent to it. Chartered accountants work in all fields of business and finance, including auditing, taxation, financial and general management. However, there are no colleges or university affiliation but still it is not a competitive exam. Thanks

It is an exam for Professional Diploma certificate, that enables the person, to write Chartered Accountant as a Title in front of their names. It does not fall under the category of competitive exam. However, there are no colleges or university affiliating. The diploma availed is affiliated by The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India which is set up by under Parliament of India.
